DucksManager : Gestion de collection de: DucksManager : Your Disney comics collection manager
DucksManager est gratuit et sans limite: DucksManager is free and has no use limits.

Prenez le temps de découvrir les fonctio:
Take the time to discover how DucksManager will change the way you manage your Disney comic books collection.

You can add or remove issues from the demo collection, but remember that every hour all the user-generated data will be removed.
If you want to log out of the demo mode in order to sign up or to login to your real collection, use the link in the left menu.
